summary: This mod will change some roars and sounds of dragons to their \"supposedly\" English translations.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mostly for fun mod that changes various dragon sounds to an extremely pissed off dragon who is none too happy with your presence, something that already happened, except now you will be able to understand the extent of his anger.

This is my first mod and I was inspired by Camelslayer with his mod Profane Dragons
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10218

This mod is an edit of his mod and all credit for the original idea and creation goes to him.

I have taken the sound files used in his and edited them in order to make them sound similar to the dragon voices we are familiar with.

Credits to:
Camelslayer for his original mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10218

The crazy guy who yelled at his cats:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nzl12PjQLiw
author: Silvermysti
